entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite how to prevent all the runtime binaries from being emitted? #32382
  • [EF Core 8] Many-to-many relationship with payload #32381
  • Special folders as file location for DB #32380
  • ef core seperate migration project #32378
  • Problem updating an entity in relational database #32377
  • LINQ "Contains" fails to generate SQL with custom converter #32376
  • Did Contains stop working on empty list in EF Core 8? #32375
  • New OpenJSON expression to SQL translation breaks argregates on subquery with 'Cannot perform an aggregate function on an expression containing an aggregate or a subquery' exception #32374
  • EF Core 6 - After Save entity state is reset before event is triggered #32373
  • Improve multi-tenancy support #32371

Closed

  • Convert_regular_column_of_temporal_table_to_sparse failing #32154
    9.0.0
  • EFC8: Lazy Loading regression on newly created objects #32314
    8.0.1
  • Nav expansion visitor does not visit the non-lambda arguments (Skip, Take, ElementAt) #32312
    8.0.2
  • Nav expansion visitor does not visit the Contains item argument #32217
    8.0.2
  • BUG: AccessViolationException using where expression on decimal in .Net 6, x86 target, Sqlite #32180

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #32379
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fix to #31448 Use token for NonQueryResultAsync (#31449) #32334
    Servicing-approved
  • Fix to #32154 - Convert_regular_column_of_temporal_table_to_sparse failing #32370
  • [release/8.0] Don't throw when attempting to load from a newly Added entity with unknown FK values #32368
    Servicing-approved
  • Move compiled model tests to EFCore.Specification.Tests #32341
  • Fix typos, doubled words #32372
  • Bump Azure.Identity from 1.10.3 to 1.10.4 #32361
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:
